sentences.sContent: The government imposed a night-time curfew throughout the country.
The curfew was lifted (= ended ) on May 6th.
The whole town was placed under curfew .
Anyone found in the streets after curfew was shot.
sentences.sCn: 宵禁期间，任何人出现在街上都被开枪打死。

trans.tranCn: 宵禁；宵禁令；晚钟；打晚钟时刻
trans.tranOther: a law that forces people to stay indoors after a particular time at night, or the time people must be indoors
